attributes.action: Remove naked pictures of 10 year old children from Tate Modern
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How can we stand by in a society that seeks to protect our children from vile and predatory individuals when one of our leading art galleries sees fit to display a photo of a naked ten year old girl under the pretence of 'Art'?

rejection.details: It has been reported that the picture has already been removed on the advice of the Metropolitan Police.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
